input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Gender has a direct effect on having a brother and recovery. Having a brother has a direct effect on recovery. The overall probability of having a brother is 49%. The probability of not having a brother and recovery is 40%. The probability of having a brother and recovery is 17%. Is the chance of recovery smaller when observing having a brother?
